definition: to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
thin or slender/finely particulate/thin and soft/fine/delicate/trifling/(of a sound) quiet/frugal

sentences.english: The PAS reaction was of pGcs positive.
sentences.chinese: 原始生殖細胞的PAS反應呈陽性。

sentences.english: At the same time, aromatase immunopositive substance also distributed in the germ cells of ovary and testis.
sentences.chinese: 同時，免疫陽性物質也定位在卵巢和精巢的生殖細胞。

sentences.english: Objective To study the damage effect of inhalation carbon disulfide on germ cells of mice.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察二硫化碳吸入對小鼠生殖細胞的損傷。

sentences.english: Objective: To evaluate the diagnostic value of US in extragonadal germ cell tumors (EGGCT).
sentences.chinese: 目的評價超聲對性腺外生殖細胞腫瘤的診斷價值。

sentences.english: In the human reproductive process, two kinds of sex cells, or gametes (pronounced: gah-meetz), are involved.
sentences.chinese: 在人類的生殖過程中，兩類生殖細胞至關重要。

sentences.english: Testis spermatogenic cell apoptosis is a complicated polygene-related process.
sentences.chinese: 睾丸生殖細胞的凋亡是一個由多基因參與的複雜過程。

sentences.english: The wall of the generative cell contains callose.
sentences.chinese: 生殖細胞壁爲胼胝質成分。

sentences.english: Objective To study the clinical and MR features of intracranial germinoma.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析顱內生殖細胞瘤的臨牀表現及影像特徵。

sentences.english: More inclusions were present in the tube cell than in the generative cell.
sentences.chinese: 管細胞比生殖細胞有更豐富的內含物。

sentences.english: No apparent alterations were observed in genital cells of hookworm.
sentences.chinese: 未見鉤蟲生殖細胞超微結構明顯變化。

sentences.english: The gonads are the follicular style and are composed of germ cells and nutrition cells.
sentences.chinese: 生殖腺爲濾泡型，由營養細胞和生殖細胞共同構成。

sentences.english: Conclusion Glycyrrhiza uralensis fisch shows a protective effect, namely antimutagenesis, on injury of genetic materials in reproductive cells of male mouse.
sentences.chinese: 結論甘草對小鼠雄性生殖細胞遺傳損傷具有防護作用。

sentences.english: Objective:To isolate and clone bovine embryonic stem cells from bovine fetus Primordial germ cells(PGCs).
sentences.chinese: 目的從牛原始生殖細胞中分離克隆牛胚胎幹細胞。

sentences.english: Germ cell tumor is the most common tumor of male patients aged 15-35.
sentences.chinese: 生殖細胞腫瘤是15～35歲男性最常見的惡性腫瘤。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the clinical character of the germinoma of cerebral hemispheres .
sentences.chinese: 目的探討大腦半球生殖細胞瘤的臨牀特點。

sentences.english: GMA was also genotoxic to germ cells of male mice in vivo.
sentences.chinese: GMA對雄性小鼠生殖細胞也有遺傳毒性。
